body_html:
Thanks @meteorcloudy. Under MSYS it seems to work fine:

user@WinDev1804Eval MSYS ~
$ patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch
patching file scripts/pnglibconf.h.prebuilt

user@WinDev1804Eval MSYS ~
$

But when invoking Bazel, the error still exists.

body:
Thanks @meteorcloudy. Under MSYS it seems to work fine:
```
user@WinDev1804Eval MSYS ~
$ patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch
patching file scripts/pnglibconf.h.prebuilt

user@WinDev1804Eval MSYS ~
$
```

But when invoking Bazel, the error still exists.
